faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Aiden Link

setup.question: How long does setup take?
setup.answer: Most customers are live in under 5 minutes. Just upload your documents, customize the appearance, and embed the widget on your site with a single line of code. No technical skills required.

arabic.question: Does Aiden Link work in Arabic?
arabic.answer: Yes! Aiden Link has native Arabic and English support, making it perfect for MENA businesses. The AI understands and responds naturally in both languages, and can even switch between them mid-conversation.

trial.question: Can I try before buying?
trial.answer: Absolutely! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required. You can also use our Free plan forever with 100 messages per month.

handoff.question: How does human handoff work?
handoff.answer: When Aiden Link detects a complex question or when a customer requests human help, it seamlessly transfers the conversation to your team via email notification or our agent dashboard. All conversation context is preserved.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Enterprise-grade security is our priority. We're GDPR compliant and SOC 2 ready. All data is encrypted at rest (AES-256) and in transit (TLS 1.3). Your data is never used to train AI models.

unanswered.question: What happens if Aiden Link can't answer a question?
unanswered.answer: Aiden Link will politely let the customer know and offer to connect them with a human agent. It can also collect their contact information for follow-up. You'll see unanswered questions in your dashboard to improve your knowledge base.

customize.question: Can I customize the chatbot's personality?
customize.answer: Yes! You can customize the name, avatar, colors, welcome message, and conversation style. You can make it formal for banking or friendly for retail. It adapts to your brand voice.

refund.question: Do you offer refunds?
refund.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. If you're not satisfied for any reason, contact us for a full refund. No questions asked.
